mapper.select: SELECT * FROM micromap WHERE contentframeworkdetailid IN (SELECT DISTINCT essentialelementid FROM ititestsessionhistory WHERE studentid = #{studentID,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND status NOT IN (SELECT id FROM category WHERE categoryname IN ('ITI Cancel')))

SELECT DISTINCT linkagelabel, linkagelevelshortdesc, linkagelevellongdesc FROM micromap WHERE contentframeworkdetailid = #{contentFrameworkDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND activeflag IS TRUE ORDER BY versionnumber DESC
